translation: The brave warriors are giving blows of maces on the back of the lion.20.176.

transliteration: Kite Sron Chattan|| Kite Soos Phouttan||
translation: Somewhere the blood is being drunk, somewhere the head is lying broken.
Somewhere there is din and somewhere the heroes are rising again.21.177.

transliteration: Kahoon Dhoor(i) Louttan|| Kite Maar Routtan||
translation: Somewhere the warriors are lying in the dust, somewhere there is repetition of the shouts of “kill, kill”.

transliteration: Bhane Jas Bhattan|| Kite Pet Phattan||22||178||
translation: Somewhere the minstrels are eulogizing the warriors and somewhere warriors with wounded bellies are lying down.22.178.

transliteration: Bhaje Chhattr(i) Thattan|| Kite Khoon Khattan||
translation: The bearers of canopies are running away and somewhere the blood is being flowin.

transliteration: Kite Doust Dattan|| Phire Jyon Harattan||23||179||
translation: Somewhere the tyrants are being destroyed and the warriors are running hither and thither like the Persian wheel.23.179.
All the warriors are bedecked with the bow;

transliteration: Lae Khagg Aae|| Mahaa Roh Vdare||24||180||
translation: And all of them are holding their swords like the dreadful saw.24.180.

transliteration: Sahoo Roop Kdare|| Mano Sindh(u) Khre||
translation: They are verily of dark complexion like the saltish sea.

transliteration: Kai Baar Gdare|| Su Maaran Ouchdare||25||181||
translation: Though they have been destroyed several times, but still they are shouting “kill, kill”.25.181.
Bhavani (Durga) hath destroyed all like the jawahan plant destroyed by the continuous rain.

gurmukhi: bfy hI luJwry ]huqy jy hIey vwry ]26]182]
transliteration: Bade Hoo Lujhdare|| Houte Je Hooe Vdare||26||182||
translation: Many other brave demons have been crushed under her feet.26.182.

transliteration: Ikan Baar Tdare|| Thamannd Thok Thdare||
translation: The enemies have been destroyed in the first round and thrown away. They have been struck on their bodies with weapons and made cool (by death).
